articles.title: Sony Bravia 8 II QD-OLED TV series launched in India with XR processor, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos
articles.description: Sony Bravia 8 II QD-OLED TV series launched in India with XR processor, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, and cinematic picture and audio technologies.
articles.content:
Sony India today announced the launch of its Bravia 8 II QD-OLED TV series in India. The new range comes with QD-OLED technology, an XR processor and Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos support for a cinematic home viewing experience.

articles.title: Student-led crew brings Albertosaurus named Rose to the screen
articles.description: The second season of BBC’s hit Walking With Dinosaurs features a team of U of A graduate students helping excavate an Albertosaurus and bring it to life on screen.
articles.content:
The first season of the BBC’s Walking With Dinosaurs aired in 2000, and Colton Coppock still remembers the excitement of watching and rewatching the VHS copy his uncle had taped.
“That was like my dinosaur bible, essentially,” says Coppock, now a PhD... [4745 chars]

articles.title: How Clean Is Your House? star Kim Woodburn dies aged 83

articles.content:

articles.title: Katie Boulter reveals death threats from angry gamblers targeting her and her family
articles.description: British tennis player Katie Boulter has told the BBC she received death threats targeting her and her family during the French Open, saying in an interview that online abuse has become the norm and that she is worried about the impact it will have on younger players.
